comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the amount invested in healthcare and y be the amount invested in telecom.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "x \geq 0",
        "y \geq 0",
        "y \geq 3x",
        "y \leq 70000",
        "x + y \leq 100000"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 0.01x + 0.03y"
}
